DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluated whether the depth of neuromuscular block may affect the unicon value of anesthetic depth monitoring system (ADMS).
DOC.brief_title: Neuromuscular Block and Anesthetic Depth Monitoring
DOC.criteria: Gall bladder disease American Society of Anesthesiologist physical status 1 or 2 Pregnancy Body mass index < 16 Body mass index >30 Neuromuscular disease Previous intraabdominal surgery
